spec_data.Name: alsa-plugins-vdownmix
spec_data.Description:
The vdownmix plugin is a downmixer from 4-6 channels to 2-channel
stereo headphone output.  This plugin processes the input signals with
a simple spacialization, so the output sounds like a kind of "virtual
surround".
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 10:39:51 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Downmixer to stereo plugin for ALSA
